__documentation.summary: Set all borders of all cells of the given table

params.name: contextNodeId
params.description: The NodeId of the table (or any of its parts) for which to change the border

contextual-cals-set-all-cell-borders-all.label: t__All borders
contextual-cals-set-all-cell-borders-all.description: t__Add borders to the entire table

__documentation.summary: Remove all borders of all cells of the given table

params.name: contextNodeId
params.description: The NodeId of the table (or any of its parts) for which to change the border

contextual-cals-set-all-cell-borders-non.label: t__No borders
contextual-cals-set-all-cell-borders-non.description: t__Remove borders from the entire table

__documentation.summary: Set all borders of the given cells

params.name: cellNodeIds
params.description: The NodeIds of the cells for which to change the border

contextual-cals-set-cell-border-all.label: t__All borders
contextual-cals-set-cell-border-all.description: t__Add borders to the current cells

__documentation.summary: Set all borders of the cell containing the selection

cals-set-cell-border-all.description: t__Add borders to the current cells

__documentation.summary: Remove all borders of the given cells
